home.choose_path_description: Become a tenant at StaySpace and enjoy a comfortable accommodation with modern amenities, or become a host and maximize the value of your property's full potential with our experts in real estate management. Choose the path that suits you and start your journey with us today.
home.share_needs_description: Fill out our simple registration form to start your experience with StaySpace. Share your accommodation preferences and requirements, so we can provide the perfect place to stay or improve your property management services tailored to your specific needs.
home.personal_services_description: Our dedicated team at StaySpace will give you the personal service and tailor-made housing solutions. We will guide you through each step of the process, ensuring a seamless and hassle-free experience, whether you're looking to rent or manage a property.
home.location_description: Operating all over Sweden - Always close to you regardless of boundaries.
home.trusted_description: Worry-free handling - We handle all contact, agreements & invoicing.
home.all_in_one_description: One contact for accommodation throughout Sweden.
home.map_stat: 9000+ accommodation options in the Nordics & Central Europe
home.building_stat: 1600 new apartments added to our portfolio yearly
home.users_stat: 400 local experts in 150 cities ready to help arrange accommodation by request
home.why_choose_points_1: Tailored support and solutions adapted to your needs.
home.why_choose_points_2: Smooth and hassle-free experience from start to the End.
home.why_choose_points_3: Fast and reliable service at every step of the process.
home.why_choose_points_4: 24/7 support to ensure we are always here when you need us.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: We value your privacy and strive to protect your personal information. This page explains how we collect, use and protect your information when you visit our website.

section_1.title: 1. What information do we collect?
section_1.content: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us, for example when you fill out contact forms, register for our services or communicate with us. This may include name, email address, phone number and company information.

section_2.title: 2. How do we use your information?
section_2.point_2: Communicate with you and respond to your inquiries
section_2.point_3: Send relevant information, such as offers and updates (you can always opt out of marketing messages)
section_2.point_4: Ensure a smooth user experience on our website

section_3.title: 3. Sharing of data
section_3.content: We do not share your personal data with third parties, except if necessary to complete our services (e.g., payment providers or technical services) or if required by law.

section_4.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
section_4.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve the user experience on our website. These help us collect information about how you navigate our site and customize content based on your preferences. You can choose to disable cookies in your browser, but some features of the website may be affected.

section_5.title: 5. Security
section_5.content: We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss or misuse.

section_6.title: 6. Your rights
section_6.content: You have the right to request information about what personal data we have about you, as well as the right to correct, erase or request that we restrict the processing of your data. If you wish to exercise these rights or have any questions about our handling of your personal data, please contact us.

section_7.title: 7. Changes to the Privacy Policy
section_7.content: We may update this Privacy Policy. In the event of major changes, we will inform you by publishing an updated version on our website.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about our privacy policy or how we handle your personal data, please contact us at

carousel_company.heading: Our Trusted Partners
carousel_company.description: StaySpace works with some of the best companies in the industry to provide seamless accommodation solutions. Our trusted partners help us deliver top-tier service to tenants and hosts alike.
